meanings.definition: Consisting of or involving six things or people.
meanings.sent1: The senary team won the game with six players.
meanings.sent2: The senary cupcakes were perfect for the family gathering.
meanings.sent3: The senary colored balloons made the party decorations complete.
meanings.sent4: Her senary fingers swiftly typed the code on the keyboard.
meanings.sent5: The senary dice rolled onto the table, showing different numbers.

meanings.definition: A group or set of six.
meanings.sent1: She bought a senary of colorful pencils for her art project.
meanings.sent2: The bakery sold a senary of delicious donuts every morning.
meanings.sent3: The senary of kittens played together in the backyard.
meanings.sent4: The music band consisted of a senary of talented musicians.
meanings.sent5: The senary of books on the shelf caught her attention.

meanings.sent1: The senary symbol was used to indicate the quantity of items.
meanings.sent2: The senary page in the book had detailed information about the topic.
meanings.sent3: The senary dots on the dice added up to the number six.
meanings.sent4: The senary candles on the cake lit up the room with a warm glow.
meanings.sent5: The senary petals on the flower created a beautiful pattern.
